Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26998557] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus 6271(MIC=32 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=1.9 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=9 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 5482(MIC=5 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=5.2 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26998557] LC50>400 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide from the Wild Bee Hylaeus signatus Venom and Its Analogues Structure-Activity Study and Synergistic Effect with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Nešuta O, Hexnerová R, Buděšínský M, Slaninová J, Bednárová L, Hadravová R, Straka J, Veverka V, Čeřovský V
